channel.title: Everyone is in need of a good essminer/banker
channel.description: Hey guys i tried using solemn wishes essminer/banker and it gets to the ess fine but then clicks on the essence but doesnt click on "Mine rune essence", so i did it manually then when my inevent is full it walkt to the portal and clicks on it but doesnt click enter portal!! Please create a good version someone or help me with what is happening in Solemn wishes version? :P

item.title: Everyone is in need of a good essminer/banker
item.dc:creator: @m0u53m4t m0u53m4t
item.description:
@m0u53m4t wrote:

To click on the text mine you just type : ClickText(‘Mine’,6,6,514,335) and for portal I just used color, then said when mouse is over, check option2. Its pretty much done now. Here is the beta (rep would be appreciated :D):

[scar]program m0u53m4tsessminer;program m0u53m4tsessminer;
{.include SRL\SRL.scar}

/////////////////////////////////////\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\
//////////////////////////m0u53m4ts EssMiner 0.84\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\
//////This was requested and has been made. It is only a beta, so will get\\
///////lost and stuck very often. Im still improving it alot, but people\\\
////////seemed to really want it now, so here it is, so no moaning! ;D\\\\
/////////////////////////////////////\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\
///////////////////////////////////Bugs\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\
////////////////Currently aweful ess finding, but it works\\\\\\\\\\
///////////////////////////Gets lost very often\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\
////////////////////////////Doesn’t reset north\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\
/////////////////////////////////////\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\
///////////////////////////////Instructions\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\
////////////////////1. Fill in the Players table below\\\\\\\\\\\\
/////////////////2. Start in east varrock bank facing north.\\\\\\\\\
/////////////////////////////////////\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\
/////////////////////////////////Comments\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\
////If you liked this script, PLEASE donate money to junk4owen@hotmail.com\\
////////////////////////////SRL r0x m’/ w0r7d!\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\
/////////////////////////////////////\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\

var
mx,my,sparex,sparey: integer;
essdtm,essdtm2,bankfloordtm,
boothdtm,shopsymboldtm,
quicklybmp,runeininventdtm,
storeallbmp,aubdtm,tries: integer;
premousespeed,ran1,ran2,
banksymboldtm,direction: integer;
inmag,inbank: boolean;

const StartPlayer = 0; // Determines who will play first

Procedure DeclarePlayers;
begin
HowManyPlayers :=2; // Set Number of Players here.
NumberOfPlayers(HowManyPlayers); // Sets the Players Array Length;
CurrentPlayer:=StartPlayer; // CurrentPlayer = Array Index

 Players[0].Name :='';
 Players[0].Pass :='';
 Players[0].Nick :='';
 Players[0].Loc  :='Loc1';
 Players[0].Skill:='';
 Players[0].Active:=True;

 Players[1].Name :='';
 Players[1].Pass :='';
 Players[1].Nick :='';
 Players[1].Loc  :='';
 Players[1].Skill:='';
 Players[1].Active:=True;

 Players[2].Name :='';
 Players[2].Pass :='';
 Players[2].Nick :='';
 Players[2].Loc  :='Loc1';
 Players[2].Skill:='';
 Players[2].Active:=True;

 writeln(inttostr(HowManyPlayers)+' Players');

end;

procedure openbag;
begin
if not findcolortolerance(mx,my,2829182,628,170,634,175,20) then mouse(650,184,5,5,true)
end;

procedure walktoaubury;
begin
shopsymboldtm:= DTMFromString(‘78DA636C66626098C90006AC108AE183AA349’ +
‘86604E2FF40C00852330B55CD8F5261B81A100000628A08F8’);
if findcolortolerance(mx,my,5406350,626,136,680,162,15) then
begin
mouse(mx+random(5),my+5+random(5),3,3,true)
wait(10000)
if random(3) = 1 then antiban
wait(10000)
humanflag(20)
inmag := true
end
if weareinmm(shopsymboldtm) = false then
begin
inmag:=false
mouse(669,134,4,4,true)
if direction = 2 then mouse(608,114,4,4,true)
wait(random(15))
if direction = 2 then mouse(608,114,4,4,true)
wait(14000)
humanflag(20)
writeln(‘walked down’)
if findcolortolerance(mx,my,4087611,564,23,723,120,10) then
begin
findcolortolerance(mx,my,3363694,mx-100,my-100,mx+100,my+100,20)
mouse(mx,my,2,2,true)
inmag := true
flag
writeln(‘Clicked on floor’)
end

if inmag=false then
begin
if (findcolortolerance(mx,my,4478526,559,8,721,156,10) = false) and (findcolortolerance(mx,my,1603327,559,8,721,156,10) = false) then writeln(‘Lost on the way to the magic shop’)
if (findcolortolerance(mx,my,4478526,682,4,869,162,10)) or (findcolortolerance(mx,my,1603327,559,8,721,156,10)) or (weareinmm(shopsymboldtm)) then
begin
finddtm(shopsymboldtm,mx,my,559,22,723,149)
mouse(mx,my,2,2,true)
if random(3) = 1 then
if findcolortolerance(mx,my,5406350,mx-200,my-200,mx+200,my+200,10) then
mouse(mx+10+random(4),my+10+random(4),2,2,true)
inmag := true
flag
writeln(‘Clicked on floor’)
end
end
end
aubdtm:= DTMFromString(‘78DA637CC6C8C0301B8891C08474350636200’ +
‘D12FD0F048C8F81AC39A86ADA1395E16A400000800F0939’);
tries:= 0
repeat
begin
tries:= tries+1
if tries > 4 then
begin
tries := 0
findcolortolerance(mx,my,5277067,600,65,670,110,15)
mouse(mx+10+random(5),my+10+random(5),3,3,true)
humanflag(20)
end
mmouse(random(600),random(335),2,2)
finddtm(aubdtm,mx,my,6,6,511,334)
if weareinms(aubdtm) then mmouse(mx,my,2,2)
if(option2(‘Tal’)) then mouse(mx,my,3,3,false)
end
until(ClickText(‘elepor’,6,6,514,335))
freedtm(shopsymboldtm)
wait(10000+random(500))
end;

procedure walktoess;
begin
if(findcolortolerance(mx,my,1008341,584,27,722,156,30) = false) then
begin
repeat
begin
findcolortolerance(mx,my,10132390,564,2,726,160,35)
mouse(mx,my,3,3,true)
flag
findcolortolerance(mx,my,9145750,564,2,726,160,20)
mouse(mx,my,3,3,true)
flag
findnormalrandoms
if(random(5)=1) then antiban
end
until(findcolortolerance(mx,my,1008341,564,2,726,160,30))
end
end;

procedure randomessfinder;
begin
premousespeed := MouseSpeed
MouseSpeed := 30 +random(5) - random(5)
mx := 250 + random(200) - random(200)
my := 130 + random(150) - random(150)
mmouse(mx,my,5,5)
repeat
begin
ran1:= 0
ran2:= 0
if (mx < 250) then ran1:=1
if (my < 130) then ran2:=1
if random(3) = 1 then if ran1=1 then ran1:=0
if random(3) = 1 then if ran1=0 then ran1:=1
if random(4) = 1 then if ran2=1 then ran2:=0
if random(4 ) = 1 then if ran2=0 then ran2:=1
if ran1= 0 then mx := mx - random(140)
if ran1= 1 then mx := mx + random(140)
if ran2= 0 then my := my - random(140)
if ran2= 1 then my := my + random(140)
mmouse(mx,my,2,2)
findnormalrandoms
end
until(option2(‘une’)=true)
mousespeed := premousespeed
flag
end;

procedure mineess;
begin
essdtm:= DTMFromString(‘78DA635CCEC8C0C0C2C4800C14E5E41880A26’ +
‘0FC1F08181762AAD1D2D080AB010100FB400630’);
essdtm2:= DTMFromString(‘78DA63FCCDC8C02009C44860CBCA150CAC401’ +
‘A24FA1F08187F00598AA86AD62D5A04A661A28C9F812C1B5435AB’ +
‘17CC4751030046AA0D4B’);
wait(3000)
openbag
tries := 0
repeat
begin

repeat
begin
  if weareinms(essdtm) then
  begin
  finddtm(essdtm,mx,my,6,6,513,335)
  mmouse(mx,my,3,3)
  if option2('une') = true then break
  end
  if weareinms(essdtm2) then
  begin
  finddtm(essdtm2,mx,my,6,6,513,335)
  mmouse(mx,my,3,3)
  if option2('une') = true then break
  writeln('looking for ess')
  end
     if tries = 10 then writeln('Using random searcher')
     if tries = 10 then randomessfinder
     tries := tries +1
  findnormalrandoms
end
wait(10+random(5))

until option2(‘une’) = true //sees its ess
mmouse(mx,my,3,3)
if option2(‘une’) = false then randomessfinder
mouse(mx,my,6,7,true)
findnormalrandoms
wait(7000)
if(random(3)=1) then antiban
end
until findcolortolerance(sparex,sparey,8026755,554,205,737,462,5) //ess in invent

repeat
begin
mmouse(mx,my,3,3)
if option2(‘une’) = false then randomessfinder
mouse(mx,my,6,7,true)
findnormalrandoms
wait(5000+random(5000))
if(random(3)=1) then antiban
findnormalrandoms
end
until(findcolortolerance(sparex,sparey,6053477,703,435,716,452,25))

repeat
wait(100)
until findcolortolerance(mx,my,1008341,586,16,711,123,25)
mouse(mx,my,3,3,true)
flag
wait(1000)

repeat
begin
tries := 0
repeat
begin
tries := tries +1
if tries =5 then
begin
findcolortolerance(mx,my,1008341,586,16,711,123,25)
mouse(mx,my,3,3,true)
flag
tries := 0
end
mmouse(random(500),random(350),3,3)
wait(200)
if findcolortolerance(sparex,sparey,2461802,603,41,702,104,20) then break
end
until findcolortolerance(mx,my,12843514,6,6,514,335,15)
if findcolortolerance(sparex,sparey,2461802,603,41,702,104,20) then break
mouse(mx,my,3,3,false)
ClickText(‘Use’,6,6,514,335)
wait(10000)
end
until findcolortolerance(sparex,sparey,5009798,603,41,702,104,10)
end;

procedure walktobank;
begin
inbank:= false
bankfloordtm := DTMFromString(‘78DA63E4676660E0676440069D0DF50CAC401’ +
‘A24FA1F08187930D5E4A5A5C1D5800000093C070E’);
banksymboldtm:= DTMFromString(‘78DA63EC60626070674001EFEF2532B001694’ +
‘620FE0F048C9D986A6A0AC5E06A4000006F8108E1’);
wait(5000)
mouse(681,44,3,3,true)
wait(5000)
flag
clickmmdtm(banksymboldtm)
flag
ClickMmDTM(bankfloordtm)
wait(4000)
humanflag(20)
end;

procedure bank;
begin
flag
boothdtm := DTMFromString(‘78DA639CC1C8C0B0098891409A0F27033F900’ +
‘689FE0702C66940D6665435EDD986703520000058970894’);
quicklybmp := BitmapFromString(14, 6, ‘z78DA337531353131774302A660116’ +
‘4D20009208BBBE10098B2C87A71D985A91ED35E62CC24461CBFBD’ +
‘83CD4C5C2143AA5E640000094B7705’);
tries:= 0
sendarrowsilentwait(2,2000+random(1000))
repeat
begin
tries := tries +1
if tries > 6 then ClickMmDTM(bankfloordtm)
mmouse(random(700),random(400),20,20)
finddtm(boothdtm,mx,my,275,6,513,335)
mouse(mx,my,3,3,false)
wait(50+random(10))
if findbitmaptolerancein(quicklybmp,mx,my,6,6,513,335,50) then mouse(mx,my,3,3,true)
wait(1000+random(500))
end
until bankscreen= true
sendarrowsilentwait(0,2000+random(300))
runeininventdtm:= DTMFromString(‘78DA639465666010676240062EF6F60C5C409’ +
‘A1188FF0301A30C508D24AA1A2D0D0DB81A10609403AAE1415513’ +
‘1F1989A20600C7D40710’);

storeallbmp:= BitmapFromString(7, 5, ‘z78DA737343005317531313734C1222’ +
‘6B00066E78D523AB4416C1548F4B04BF099800532500B104329B’);
repeat
begin
wait(500+random(100))
Finddtm(runeininventdtm,mx, my, 561, 214, 730, 460)
mouse(mx+7+random(5),my+10+random(5),1,1,false)
wait(1000+random(100))
findbitmaptolerancein(storeallbmp,mx,my,557,209,735,460,70)
mouse(mx+random(20)-random(30),my+random(5),2,2,true)
wait(1000+random(500))
end
until(FindInvDtm(sparex,sparey,runeininventdtm)=false)
depositall
wait(200+random(50))
mouse(486,40,10,10,true)
wait(1+random(3))
mouse(486,40,10,10,true)
if(random(3)=1) then antiban
end;

begin
setupsrl
activateclient
repeat
begin
if(random(3))= 1 then setrun(true)
if(random(3))= 1 then openbag
walktoaubury
walktoess
mineess
walktobank
bank
writeln(‘Completed 1 trip’)
end
until(loggedin = false)
end.[/scar]

Read full topic

Please create a good version someone or help me with what is happening in Solemn wishes version?
